co.cask.cdap.api.service

Interface ServiceConfigurer


  • public interface ServiceConfigurer
    Interface for configurers used to create custom Services.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHandlers(Iterable<? extends HttpServiceHandler> handlers)
      Add a a list of request handlers to the Service.
      void setDescription(String description)
      Set description of the Service.
      void setInstances(int instances)
      Sets the number of instances needed for the server that runs all HttpServiceHandlers of this Service.
      void setName(String name)
      Set name of the service.
      void setResources(Resources resources)
      Sets the resources requirements for the server that runs all HttpServiceHandlers of this Service.

    • Method Detail

      • setName

        void setName(String name)
        Set name of the service.
        Parameters:
        name - of the service.

      • setDescription

        void setDescription(String description)
        Set description of the Service.
        Parameters:
        description - to set for the Service.

      • addHandlers

        void addHandlers(Iterable<? extends HttpServiceHandler> handlers)
        Add a a list of request handlers to the Service.
        Parameters:
        handlers - to serve requests.

      • setResources

        void setResources(Resources resources)
        Sets the resources requirements for the server that runs all HttpServiceHandlers of this Service.
        Parameters:
        resources - The requirements.

      • setInstances

        void setInstances(int instances)
        Sets the number of instances needed for the server that runs all HttpServiceHandlers of this Service.
        Parameters:
        instances - Number of instances, must be > 0.
